title: gigineitor
author: gigineitor
content: Hey Community!I've been having a really hard time trying to talk with someone at the Electrum Wallet team to scope out a potential partnership, would someone please point me into the right direction here? Is there an email or a phone number I can use to reach out to the team?Any help will be appreciated!

comments.author: Bitcoin Smith
comments.created_time: September 26, 2023, 03:44:37 PMLast edit: September 26, 2023, 04:10:51 PM by Bitcoin Smith
comments.body: https://electrum.org/#communityGitHub : https://github.com/spesmilo/electrumQuoteBesides GitHub, most communication about Electrum development happens on IRC, in the #electrum channel on Libera Chat. The easiest way to participate on IRC is with the web client, web.libera.chat.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: gigineitor on September 26, 2023, 03:42:21 PMAny help will be appreciated! I think that asking them to contact you (obviously on a rather temporary email address) would be the way to go.The main contributors/devs tend to be rather active on Github. I'd start from the issues page ( https://github.com/spesmilo/electrum/issues ) and find my way from there.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: How about try to contact the creator of Electrum ThomasV directly here on the forum?Check his profile below he was online a few days ago.- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3137Or you can contact him through email at thomasv@electrum.org

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: Quote from: gigineitor on September 26, 2023, 03:42:21 PMI've been having a really hard time trying to talk with someone at the Electrum Wallet team to scope out a potential partnership, would someone please point me into the right direction here? Is there an email or a phone number I can use to reach out to the team? Makes me wonder, you want to talk to the developers on phone? Seriously what is the type of partnership being discussed here? If you dont mind me asking.Though its pretty easy to contact them, ThomasV's account link is here, but being a newbie you might have difficulty sending a PM. Recommend you use their official email address. Also is someone with similar sounds or similar looking username has already PMed you, double check that it is not some imposter. There can be no end to the scams that happen here.

comments.author: SATWAT
comments.body: Quote from: BitMaxz on September 26, 2023, 04:29:07 PMHow about try to contact the creator of Electrum ThomasV directly here on the forum?Check his profile below he was online a few days ago.- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3137Or you can contact him through email at thomasv@electrum.orgLast time I have problem for downloading Electrum as I trapped and lost my coins, but now this link is saved for ages as this will work forever, and I can download this wallet anytime anywhere thanks buddies.

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: Quote from: SATWAT on October 19, 2023, 06:40:32 PMLast time I have problem for downloading Electrum as I trapped and lost my coins, but now this link is saved for ages as this will work forever, and I can download this wallet anytime anywhere thanks buddies.That is a link to ThomasV's forum profile, though the link to download Electrum is in their signature, if that is the link you have been looking for, make sure to verify Electrum after downloading. You can surely download Electrum anytime and anywhere, but for whatever it's worth always download Electrum in a safe enviroment, what that means is ensure the device is airgapped if the funds is worth a lot and at least 'free' from malware and other attacks if the funds is for spending on the go.
